name: Favor of Heaven
summary: You're one of Hei Feng's chosen people and have the authority of the Celestial Court on your side.
description:
You're one of Hei Feng's chosen people and have the authority of the Celestial Court on your side. Once per day, you can cast a 6th-level spirit blast as a divine innate spell. In addition, you gain resistance 5 to both good and evil damage.Traits

Tengu: A creature with this trait is a member of the tengu ancestry. Tengus are humanoids who resemble birds. An ability with this trait can be used or selected only by tengus. An item with this trait is created and used by tengus.
